languages.text: "Позвольте в качестве извинений и жеста доброй воли преподнести вам отступные, достойные Вольного Торговца и соответствующие доставленным неудобствам".

traits.locale_text: "Позвольте в качестве извинений и жеста доброй воли преподнести вам отступные, достойные Вольного Торговца и соответствующие доставленным неудобствам".

languages.text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."
languages.original_text: "Позвольте в качестве извинений и жеста доброй воли преподнести вам отступные, достойные Вольного Торговца и соответствующие доставленным неудобствам".

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to offer you an appropriate compensation worthy of Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for the inconvenience."
"Allow me to offer you an appropriate compensation worthy of Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for the inconvenience."
"Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."
"Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."
"Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

languages.text: “请允许我们向您提供符合行商浪人身份的赔偿，以示友好。我们对发生的一切不愉快的事情表示歉意。”
languages.original_text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我们向您提供符合行商浪人身份的赔偿，以示友好。我们对发生的一切不愉快的事情表示歉意。”

languages.text: «Permítanos ofrecer una compensación digna de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, como muestra de amistad y disculpa por todo este lamentable asunto».
languages.original_text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

traits.locale_text: «Permítanos ofrecer una compensación digna de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente, como muestra de amistad y disculpa por todo este lamentable asunto».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーにふさわしい補償を提供させてもらいたい。友好の証として、また不快な思いをさせたお詫びとして」
languages.original_text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーにふさわしい補償を提供させてもらいたい。友好の証として、また不快な思いをさせたお詫びとして」

languages.text: "Gestattet uns eine Wiedergutmachung, die {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} würdig ist, als Geste der Freundschaft und Entschuldigung für alle Unannehmlichkeiten."
languages.original_text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

traits.locale_text: "Gestattet uns eine Wiedergutmachung, die {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} würdig ist, als Geste der Freundschaft und Entschuldigung für alle Unannehmlichkeiten."

languages.text: « Permettez-nous de vous offrir une compensation digne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, en gage d'amitié, mais aussi d'excuse pour l'embarras occasionné. »
languages.original_text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-nous de vous offrir une compensation digne d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}, en gage d'amitié, mais aussi d'excuse pour l'embarras occasionné. »

languages.text: "Telafi amacıyla bir Hür Tacir'e layık bir karşılık sunmamıza müsaade edin. Hem dostluk nişanesi hem de yaşanan tatsızlığın özrü maiyetinde."
languages.original_text: "Allow us to offer you compensation worthy of a Rogue Trader, as a gesture of friendship and an apology for any unpleasantness."

traits.locale_text: "Telafi amacıyla bir Hür Tacir'e layık bir karşılık sunmamıza müsaade edin. Bir dostluk nişanesi ve yaşanan tatsızlık nedeniyle bir özür maiyetinde."
